title: Move social/contact icons element above address in footer

requirements.text: In the Footer component, move the element currently located at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[3] (the third div inside the second column group of the footer's inner container) so that it appears above the address/contact details block in that same footer column.

quotes: flytt denne til over adressen i footeren

acceptanceCriteria: The selected element is rendered above the address block in the footer column.
All other footer content and layout remain unchanged.
The footer is visually consistent across desktop and mobile viewports.

constraints: Only reorder elements within the existing footer column â€” do not add, remove, or restyle any content.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Changing the address or contact details content.
Redesigning the footer layout or styling.
